result.name: respond--independent-case-examiner-complaints-database
result.notes: Database containing details of clients who have made formal complaints about DWP Agencies and some private sector providers contracted by DWP to deliver services. Information recorded includes: Case Reference, Name, date complaint received, date complaint cleared, stage of case when cleared, Business Unit/Agency/Contractor, overall result, time taken to clear the case and number of cases outstanding.

organization.name: department-for-work-and-pensions
organization.title: Department for Work and Pensions
organization.description:
The Department for Work and Pensions (DWP) is responsible for welfare and pension policy and is a key player in tackling child poverty. It is the biggest public service delivery department in the UK and serves over 20 million customers.

DWP is a ministerial department, supported by 13 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-work-pensions

result.title: Respond - Independent Case Examiner Complaints Database

extras.value:
Not due to be released. Contains personal and sensitive data. We will review this in the light of demand and prioritisation.
We do publish DWP complaints: Annual report by the Independent Case Examiner 2013 to 2014
This is available as pdf on gov.uk
https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/dwp-complaints-annual-report-by-the-independent-case-examiner-2013-to-2014
This report covers the Independent Case Examiner’s (ICE’s) work on complaints received between 1 April 2013 and 31 March 2014 about:
•	the Child Support Agency
•	Jobcentre Plus
•	the Pension Service
•	the Disability and Carers Service
•	Debt Management (part of DWP)
•	contracted businesses that provide services on behalf of DWP
The report also includes information about the standards of service of the Independent Case Examiner’s office.
Older annual reports are available on the National Archives website:
http://webarchive.nationalarchives.gov.uk/20130704103914/http://www.ind-case-exam.org.uk/en/info/reports.asp
